SEARCH

Package Messages.Server.View

package Messages.Server.View
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AllGameMessage
    Represents a server message containing the full game state to be sent to the client's view.
    AskLobbySizeMessage
    Represents a server message requesting the client's view to ask for the lobby size.
    AskPlayerInfoMessage
    Represents a server message requesting the client's view to ask for player information.
    CrashedPlayerMessage
    Represents a server message indicating that a player has crashed or disconnected from the game.
    EndGameMessage
    Represents a server message indicating the end of the game and providing the final ranking of players.
    ErrorMessage
    Represents a server message indicating an error occurred during the game.
    NewTurnMessage
    Represents a server message indicating the start of a new turn in the game.
    OutcomeInsertTilesMessage
    Represents a server message indicating the outcome of the tile insertion operation.
    OutcomeLoginMessage
    Represents a server message indicating the outcome of a player's login attempt.
    OutcomeMessage
    Represents a server message indicating a specific outcome or warning in the game.
    OutcomeSelectTilesMessage
    Represents a server message indicating the outcome of a tile selection operation in the game.
    ReloadPlayerMessage
    Represents a server message indicating that a player needs to be reloaded in the game.
